device.label: XBee Local DIO
device.description: Device that represents the digital functionality present locally on the gateway on some devices. It presents a subset of the XBee Digital I/O driver options.

setting.label: XBee Device Manager
setting.tooltip: Must be set to the name of an XBeeDeviceManager instance.

setting.label: Sample rate
setting.tooltip: The sample rate of the XBee adapter in milliseconds.

setting.label: Channel 1 mode
setting.tooltip:
Operating I/O mode for pin 1 of the adapter. Must be a string value comprised of one of the following:
\t"In" - pin is configured to be an input. \t"Out" - pin is configured to be an output.

setting.label: Channel 2 mode
setting.tooltip:

setting.label: Channel 1 source
setting.tooltip:
If channel1_dir is configured as an output, this option setting may be specified to a "device.channel" channel name.
The Boolean value of this channel will specify to logic state for pin 1 on the adapter.
